New Records: Duckens Nazon scored four goals in a single match, a record for Haiti vs Sint Maarten
Key Match Events: Christopher Attys scored in the 41st minute
Duckens Nazon scored four goals in the 59th, 75th, 82nd minutes
Mikael Cantave scored in the 76th and 84th minutes
Pre-Game Insights: There were no pre-game insights provided in the article
Post-Match Reflections: There were no post-match reflections provided in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: Haiti won the match 6-0, their first win in the 2024-25 Concacaf Nations League Group Stage
Others: The match was played at the Estadio Centroamericano de Mayagüez in Mayagüez, Puerto Rico
